questionTitle: Some people think it is ________ to use long and little-known words.
The Chairman was so angry with the committee that he decided to ________ from it.
I want to see all of you here tomorrow morning at nine o'clock without ________.
The children were ________ by the television programme.
He ________ escape from the prison by dressing up as a guard, and then crossed the border by train.
A passer-by who actually witnessed the robbery ________ now been found.
It was impossible for her to tell the truth so she had to ________ a story.
The child woke up crying because she had ________ a nightmare.
I hope to get an answer to my letter by ________ of post.
Didn't it ever ________ to them that they would be punished?
We started early ________ to miss the worst of the traffic.
The children threw snowballs at ________ on their way to school.
Don't be so sure ________ yourself.
She usually buys her eggs ________ the dozen.
He's entitled ________ a pension, but he won't dream of retiring yet.
Before you run ________ other people, it is as well to consider your own faults.
The children won't go to sleep ________ we leave a light on outside their bedroom.
The effectiveness of Escher's work relies ________ his use of perspective.
The American Indians are suing the government for the return of their ________ lands.
Some animals are on the ________ of becoming extinct.
